# WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus.readyToPlay

**Case**

The item is ready to play.

## Declaration

```swift
case readyToPlay
```

## Statuses

- **WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus.unknown**: The item’s status is unknown.
- **WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus.failed**: The item can’t be played.
title: WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus.readyToPlay
